participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Calm and collected, Alex tends to approach conversations with a laid-back attitude, making them easy to talk to.
participant_1.background: Alex is a recent college graduate working in a tech startup, where he enjoys the fast-paced environment and the challenges that come with it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and curious, Jordan often asks questions to understand more about the world around her, always eager to learn.
participant_2.background: Jordan is a college student majoring in communications, passionate about social media and its impact on society.
